title: Conduct an Exit Interview
description: An employee has resigned, and HR needs to conduct an exit interview to gather feedback.

tasks.description: Schedule a voluntary exit interview with the departing employee.
Conduct the interview using a standardized set of questions regarding their experience and reason for leaving.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR representative asks all standard questions and documents the employee's feedback.

tasks.description: Enter the feedback into the HR system to be used for aggregate turnover analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: The feedback is logged in the system under the appropriate categories.
